mapper.select: SELECT ch.chapter_name AS chapterName, se.section_name AS sectionName, sub.subsection_name AS subsectionName, c.content, img.image_url AS imageUrl, img.description AS imageDescription, vid.video_url AS videoUrl, vid.platform AS videoPlatform, vid.description AS videoDescription FROM content c LEFT JOIN chapter ch ON c.chapter_id = ch.chapter_id LEFT JOIN section se ON c.section_id = se.section_id LEFT JOIN subsection sub ON c.subsection_id = sub.subsection_id LEFT JOIN subsection_image img ON sub.subsection_id = img.subsection_id LEFT JOIN subsection_video vid ON sub.subsection_id = vid.subsection_id WHERE ch.chapter_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR se.section_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR sub.subsection_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR img.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR vid.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
